2026-01-03.poem:
In the soft weave of morning light,  
a shadow dances on the wall,  
as a small bird flits from branch to branch,  
its call a sweet note in the hush of dawn.  

A gentle breeze carries whispers,  
rustling leaves and stirring petals,  
each moment a quiet wave,  
lifting the heart with simple grace.  

A stranger offers a smile,  
a hand holds another just so,  
kindness blooms in the spaces between,  
where we soften for one another.  

In this tender exchange, we find

quietly wrapping us in warmth,  
small joys echoing across the hours.
